啀字的基本解释

啀
ái
饮（酒）：“筹筋随宜放，按盘上罚啀。”
犬类相斗龇牙咧嘴的样子。

啀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ái］
［《廣韻》五佳切，平佳，疑。］
亦作“嘊1”。
(1)犬斗貌。
(2)吸饮。
(3)借作挨。艰难地度过。
(4)借作挨。拖延。

啀字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　啀； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页194第18
【廣韻】五佳切【集韻】宜佳切，?音崖。【玉篇】狗欲齧。【廣韻】犬?。【集韻】或作嘊㹞。

啀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
啀字的起名意思

暂无。

啀
Basic explanation of words
啀
ái
Drinking (wine): "Put your tendons as you like, and you will be fined on the plate."
The dogs grinned at each other.
啀
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ái］
["Guangyun" five good cuts, flat good, suspicious. ]
Also known as "嘊1".
(1) Dog fighting appearance.
(2) Drinking.
(3) Borrow to endure. Hard to get through.
(4) Borrow to endure. procrastination.
啀
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　啀; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 194 18
[Guang Yun] Five good cuts [Ji Yun] Yi Jia cuts, sound cliff. [Jade articles] The dog wants to bite. [Guang Yun] Dog?. 【Jiyun】Or as 嘊㹞.
啀
